channel.title: South Park Aliens
channel.description:
The other day I was watching South Park and paused it to eat and when I came back I noticed on the freeze frame in the crowd of people an ALIEN. Not on an alien invasion episode, it was something about Mr. Garrison.
I thought it was just an easter egg but today I googled it and apparently there's one in every episode, similar to Kenny dying.
Anyone else seen any or other easter eggs during shows?

item.title: South Park Aliens
item.dc:creator: @Erj Erj
item.description:
@Erj wrote:

Easter eggs on south park are really common. But sometimes you gotta believe its there

Read full topic
